# isDepthWriteEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether depth values can be written to the depth attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDepthWriteEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], which indicates the depth attachment is read-only.

## Specifying depth operations

- **depthCompareFunction**: The comparison that is performed between a fragment’s depth value and the depth value in the attachment, which determines whether to discard the fragment.
